title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 369-1.5 - Additional requirements

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 369-1.5 - Additional requirements

State Regulations

State assistance toward the cost of an eligible
project: (a) will not exceed 50
percent of the eligible project cost or in the case of a landfill closure
project, 90 percent of the eligible cost for a municipality with a population
less than 3,500 as determined by the federal decennial census at the time of
contract; (b) will not exceed two
million dollars; (c) will be
reduced by the amount of any other grants, including matching funds, for the
project received by the municipality from any source; and
(d) is subject to final computation and
determination by the department upon completion of the project and cannot
exceed the maximum eligible cost set forth in the contract. Notes
